rules.surveyText:
[ASK IF S2=6 OR 7]

S2a. In what type of doctor’s office do you work?
rules.plainTextRule: Only ask S2a if the respondent answered Nurse Practitioner (6) or Physician’s Assistant (7) at S2.
rules.conditionDescription: S2 must equal 6 (Nurse Practitioner) OR 7 (Physician’s Assistant).

rules.surveyText:
[ASK IF S2=1]

S3a. What type of Cardiologist are you primarily?
rules.plainTextRule: Only ask S3a if the respondent answered Cardiologist (1) at S2.

rules.surveyText:
[ASK IF S2=1-5]

S4. Are you currently board certified or eligible in your specialty?
rules.plainTextRule: Only ask S4 for respondents whose primary specialty/role is one of options 1-5 at S2 (Cardiologist, Internal Medicine/GP/PCP/Family Practice, Nephrologist, Endocrinologist, Lipidologist).
rules.conditionDescription: S2 must be in the set {1,2,3,4,5}.

rules.surveyText:
[ASK IF S2=2]

B5. How would you describe your specialty/training? Select all that apply.
rules.plainTextRule: Only ask B5 if the respondent answered Internal Medicine / General Practitioner / Primary Care / Family Practice (2) at S2.
rules.conditionDescription: S2 must equal 2 (Internal Medicine / General Practitioner / Primary Care / Family Practice).

rules.surveyText:
IF QUALIFIED: Thank you for your responses so far. You qualify for this survey – it should take you about 8 minutes to complete from here.

IF NOT QUALIFIED: Thank you for your responses, however, we have reached our quota of individuals with your qualifications.

(Throughout S1–S12 the survey includes explicit TERMINATE rules, e.g., S1 option 3 = TERMINATE; S2 option 99 = TERMINATE; S2a options 2 & 3 = TERMINATE; S4 options 'Board Eligible' and 'Neither' = TERMINATE; S5 selections (many employer/affiliation options) = TERMINATE; S6: TERMINATE IF < 3 OR > 35 YEARS; S7: TERMINATE if part-time (option 2); S8: MUST SPEND AT LEAST 70% OF TIME ON S8A, ELSE TERMINATE; S9: option 7 VA Hospital = TERMINATE; S10: TERMINATE IF <50; S11: TERMINATE IF <10; S12: TERMINATE IF D = 0.)
rules.plainTextRule: All Section A and the remaining classification questions (Section B) are only asked of respondents who 'qualified' per the screener. Qualification is determined by passing the explicit termination/eligibility checks in S1–S12 (i.e., not selecting disqualifying options and meeting numeric thresholds).
rules.conditionDescription: Respondent must have not been terminated by any screener conditions. Concretely: S1 must not equal option 3 (Don’t want to proceed); S2 must not equal 99 (Other/Terminate) and where applicable S2a must not be a terminating option; S4 must equal 'Board Certified' if shown; S5 must not include any of the listed employer/affiliation options that are marked 'TERMINATE' (respondent should select 'None of these'); S6 must be between 3 and 35 years in practice (inclusive as implied); S7 must equal Full-Time (1); S8 must show at least 70% on S8A (Treating/Managing patients); S9 must not equal option 7 (VA Hospital); S10 must be >= 50 patients; S11 must be >= 10 patients; S12 must have D (Within the last year) > 0. These screener terminations are explicitly shown in the survey text and determine who is shown the remainder of the questionnaire.

rules.surveyText: A3a. ... ONLY SHOW THERAPY WHERE A3>0
rules.plainTextRule: For the A3a grid, show each therapy row only if the respondent reported a value greater than 0 for that therapy in A3.
rules.conditionDescription: Per-therapy display: show the therapy row in A3a only when the corresponding A3 value for that therapy is > 0.

rules.surveyText: A3b. ... ONLY SHOW ROWS FOR WHICH A3a COL B > 0
rules.plainTextRule: For the A3b grid, show each therapy row only if the respondent indicated a non-zero percentage in column B ('Without a statin') for that therapy in A3a.
rules.conditionDescription: Per-therapy display: show the therapy row in A3b only when the corresponding A3a column B (Without a statin) value is > 0.

rules.surveyText: A4a. ... ONLY SHOW THERAPY WHERE A4>0
rules.plainTextRule: For the A4a grid, show each therapy row only if the respondent entered a value greater than 0 for that therapy in A4.
rules.conditionDescription: Per-therapy display: show the therapy row in A4a only when the corresponding A4 value for that therapy is > 0.

rules.surveyText: A4b. ... ONLY SHOW ROWS FOR WHICH A4a COL B > 0
rules.plainTextRule: For the A4b grid, show each therapy row only if the respondent indicated a non-zero percentage in column B ('Without a statin') for that therapy in A4a.
rules.conditionDescription: Per-therapy display: show the therapy row in A4b only when the corresponding A4a column B (Without a statin) value is > 0.

rules.surveyText:
A5. How quickly might you expect to change your prescribing of PCSK9 inhibitors based on this indication change? _Select one_

[ASK IF PRESCRIBING IN A4 is > or < A3 FOR ROWS 2, 3, OR 4 (LEQVIO, REPATHA, OR PRALUENT)]
rules.plainTextRule: Only ask A5 if prescribing in A4 differs from A3 for any of the specified PCSK9 rows (Leqvio, Repatha, or Praluent).
rules.conditionDescription: Display A5 when, for at least one of therapies 2, 3, or 4 (Leqvio, Praluent, Repatha), the A4 value is either greater than or less than the corresponding A3 value (i.e., prescribing in the 'NEXT' 100 differs from the 'LAST' 100 for those therapies).
